text: Jim March (born 21 April 1954) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Airdrieonians and Ayr United in the Scottish Football League during the 1970s and 1980s. Most of his league appearances were made with Airdrieonians, who he played for in the 1975 Scottish Cup Final. ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Airdrieonians F.C. title: Jim March
